abstract: As supporters and detractors line up to debate a 1,700-mile conduit from Alberta to Oklahoma to the Gulf Coast, job creation is pitted against environmental risks.
snippet: As supporters and detractors line up to debate a 1,700-mile conduit from Alberta to Oklahoma to the Gulf Coast, job creation is pitted against environmental risks.
lead_paragraph: The State Department's much-anticipated public meeting on the Keystone XL oil-sands pipeline is under way. Here is the live Webcast.
